classification.task_goal: Create a method to click on a specific part of the screen and return the absolute coordinates.
primary_constraints: Detect mouse click only when the mouse is clicked inside the specified game window.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided a method that detected mouse position but did not check for a click event, violating the constraint. The user pointed out this issue, prompting the AI to revise the code to include click detection, thus repairing the violation.
